snippet.title: Iron harness
snippet.description:
Iron harness
3 Apr 2013 by Rosanna on Bloc de Rosanna rosannabloc.wordpress.com/2013/04/03/iron-harness/
An iron harness protects my flat roof. The sequence is: flat roof \- layer of injected poliuretan - air camera - iron harness - corrugated roof. An architect friend designed it, and works nicely. No more leaks, and good isolation.
